text: The men's 50 metres freestyle at the 2018 World Para Swimming European Championships was held at the National Aquatic Centre in Dublin from 13 - 19 August. 11 classification finals are held in all over this event. ==Medalists== {| |- |S3 2018 World Para Swimming European Championships S3 | || 47.04 | || 50.05 | || 52.28 |- |S4 2018 World Para Swimming European Championships S4 | || 40.40 | colspan=2 bgcolor=#e8e8e8 align=center| no medal awarded | || 40.93 |- |S5 2018 World Para Swimming European Championships S5 | || 31.18* | || 32.95 | || 32.97 |- |S6 2018 World Para Swimming European Championships S6 | || 30.59 | || 31.67 | || 31.88 |- |S7 2018 World Para Swimming European Championships S7 | || 28.38 | || 28.48 | || 29.18 |- |S8 2018 World Para Swimming European Championships S8 | || 28.06 | || 28.43 | || 28.67 |- |S9 2018 World Para Swimming European Championships S9 | || 25.00 WR | || 26.43 | || 26.50 |- |S10 2018 World Para Swimming European Championships S10 | || 23.54 | || 23.84 | || 24.45 |- |S11 2018 World Para Swimming European Championships S11 | || 27.01 | || 27.40 | || 27.97 |- |S12 2018 World Para Swimming European Championships S12 | || 23.64 | || 23.73 | || 24.06 |- |S13 2018 World Para Swimming European Championships S13 | || 23.77 | || 24.61 | || 25.61 |- |colspan=7| |- |- bgcolor= e8e8e8 |colspan=7| |} * Fantin swam a WR 31.16 in the heats. ==See also== *List of IPC world records in swimming ==References== 50 metres freestyle
title: 2018 World Para Swimming European Championships – Men's 50 metres freestyle
